input: John likes pizza.
Truck_A is a truck.
Truck_A has a capacity of 1000.
The temperature is greater than 20.
Package_1 is assigned to Drone_A.
User_1 has logged in today.
User_1 has logged in to Portal_1.
The score is greater than or equal to 10.
The weight is less than or equal to 50.
The permissions contains Admin.
The permissions does not contain Guest.
If John likes pizza and Mary likes sushi then John is happy.
If John likes pizza, Mary likes sushi.
A route is valid if the number of packages is greater than 0.
System is stable because John likes pizza and Mary likes sushi.
Rule: A route is valid if the total weight of all packages in the route is less than or equal to the capacity of the vehicle.
Rule: A location represents a hazard if either it is not the case that the location is secure or the weather at the location is stormy.
Command: Return the name of every vehicle whose capacity is greater than 500 and that is located at Warehouse_Main.
Command: Verify that no package whose weight is greater than 100 is assigned to a drone.
Verify that every server that handles payments is encrypted.
Find a schedule for every meeting such that no meeting overlaps with another meeting.
Simulate 10 steps.
Maximize the number of packages delivered such that every route is valid and the total fuel cost is less than 500.
Minimize the average of delay of all flights such that no flight is canceled.
Explain why Truck_A represents a valid choice.
When the sensor detects smoke occurs, then the alarm is active.

// 1. Type Definitions
--- CONTEXT: LogisticsNetwork ---
Truck is a vehicle.
Drone is a vehicle.
---
// Facts
Truck_A is a truck.
The distance from A to B is equal to 12.
At least 2 users are active.
At most 1 server is down.
Some packages are delayed.
No package is lost.
Another meeting overlaps with the meeting.
The package which is heavy is assigned to Truck_A.
A warehouse where the temperature is greater than 20 is hot.
A user who is an admin or who is a dev is privileged.
Every user whose score is greater than 10 is valid.
The capacity of the vehicle at the warehouse is greater than 500.
If both (John likes pizza and Mary likes sushi) and Bob likes salad then Party is on.
Return every package.
John likes pizza

expectedError.name: MissingTerminatorError
expectedError.message: Statement is missing a terminator.
expectedError.hint: Add a period at the end.

input: If John likes pizza and Mary likes sushi or Bob likes salad then Party is on.

expectedError.name: MixedBooleanOperatorsError
expectedError.message: Mixed 'and'/'or' without explicit grouping (both/either/neither/it is the case that/parentheses).
expectedError.hint: Rewrite using 'either ... or ...' or parentheses.

input: Truck_A has capacity of 1000.

expectedError.name: HasFormDeterminismError
expectedError.message: Attribute form requires a determiner after 'has'.
expectedError.hint: Use 'has a <attribute> of <value>'.

input: User who is active is trusted.

expectedError.name: InvalidNounPhraseStartError
expectedError.message: Noun phrase must start with a determiner or quantifier.
expectedError.hint: Start with a/an/the/every/all/no/some/at least/at most/another.

input: A user who is active and knows Python is valid.

expectedError.name: RelativePronounRepetitionError
expectedError.message: Relative clause chain is missing a repeated pronoun.
expectedError.hint: Repeat the pronoun: 'who ... and who ...'.

input: The temperature is bigger than 20.

expectedError.name: InvalidComparatorError
expectedError.message: Invalid comparator; expected a canonical comparator.
expectedError.hint: Use 'is equal to', 'is greater than', 'contains', or 'does not contain'.

input: The name of User_1 is equal to "Alice.

expectedError.name: UnterminatedStringError
expectedError.message: Unterminated string literal.
expectedError.hint: Close the string with a double quote.

input: Return is a command.

expectedError.name: KeywordAsIdentifierError
expectedError.message: Keyword used where an identifier is expected.
expectedError.hint: Choose a different name for the identifier.

input: At least users are active.

expectedError.name: InvalidQuantifierNumberError
expectedError.message: Quantifier requires a number after 'at least' or 'at most'.
expectedError.hint: Use 'At least 2 users ...'.

input: If (John likes pizza and Mary likes sushi then Party is on.

expectedError.name: InvalidParenthesesError
expectedError.message: Unbalanced parentheses.
expectedError.hint: Close the parentheses or remove them.

input: Find a schedule for every meeting no meeting overlaps with another meeting.

expectedError.name: InvalidCommandFormError
expectedError.message: Command form is missing a required clause.
expectedError.hint: Use the required form, such as 'find ... such that ...'.

input:
Action: Deliver Package_1
Precondition: Package_1 is ready.
Effect: Package_1 is delivered.

expectedError.name: ActionBlockMissingRequiredFieldError
expectedError.message: Action block is missing a required field.
expectedError.hint: A valid block must include both Action and Agent.

input:
Agent: Robot_1
Precondition: Package_1 is ready.
Effect: Package_1 is delivered.

expectedError.name: ActionBlockMissingRequiredFieldError
expectedError.message: Action block is missing a required field.
expectedError.hint: A valid block must include both Action and Agent.

input: When the sensor detects smoke, then the alarm is active.

expectedError.name: TransitionRuleMissingOccursError
expectedError.message: Transition rule is missing the 'occurs' keyword.
expectedError.hint: Use 'When <event> occurs, then <effect>.'

input: Simulate steps.

expectedError.name: InvalidCommandFormError
expectedError.message: Command form is missing a required clause.
expectedError.hint: Use the required form, such as 'simulate 10 steps'.

input: A user who is an admin or who is a dev and who is active is privileged.

expectedError.name: MixedRelativeBooleanOperatorsError
expectedError.message: Mixed boolean operators inside a relative restriction without explicit grouping.
expectedError.hint: Group explicitly with parentheses or use either/both forms.

input:
Action: Deliver Package_1
Agent: Robot_1
Precondition: Package_1 is ready.
Effect: Package_1 is delivered.

Action: Assign Package_2 to Drone_A
Agent: Dispatcher_1
Precondition: Package_2 is available.
Precondition: Drone_A is ready.
Effect: Package_2 is assigned to Drone_A.
Intent: Plan to achieve package assigned.
When the sensor detects smoke occurs the alarm is active.

Action: Deliver Package_1
Action: Deliver Package_2
Agent: Robot_1
Effect: Package_2 is delivered.

expectedError.name: ActionBlockDuplicateFieldError
expectedError.message: Action block has a duplicate unique field.
expectedError.hint: Keep unique fields single and list multiple preconditions/effects.

input:
Action: Deliver Package_1
Agent: Robot_1
Agent: Robot_2
Effect: Package_1 is delivered.

expectedError.name: ActionBlockDuplicateFieldError
expectedError.message: Action block has a duplicate unique field.
expectedError.hint: Keep unique fields single and list multiple preconditions/effects.

input: When the sensor detects smoke occurs.

expectedError.name: UnexpectedEOFError
expectedError.message: Unexpected end of input.
expectedError.hint: Complete the statement (missing object/comparator/etc.).

input: When the sensor detects smoke then the alarm is active.

expectedError.name: TransitionRuleMissingOccursError
expectedError.message: Transition rule is missing the 'occurs' keyword.
expectedError.hint: Use 'When <event> occurs, then <effect>.'
